column4: Q: What are the top 3 things I might be able to do to have better performance / responsiveness on a freshly installed Gutsy?
profile the boot, install preload and turn off access times
I know how to do #2 and #3, but how do I profile the boot?
when booting, enter grub and add profile to kernel command line. That boot, it will be abysmally slow, but it will be faster on subsequent boots
